price: Këta shembuj Ne ua paraqesim njerëzve, por ata nuk i kupton kush, përveç dijetarëve.
arabic: وَتِلۡكَ ٱلۡأَمۡثَٰلُ نَضۡرِبُهَا لِلنَّاسِۖ وَمَا يَعۡقِلُهَآ إِلَّا ٱلۡعَٰلِمُونَ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: watil'ka al-amthālu naḍribuhā lilnnāsi wamā yaʿqiluhā illā al-ʿālimūna
